site.title: Bonvera.food - Turkish Mezze, İçli Köfte and Sarmalar in Strasbourg | Fresh Production
site.description: Bonvera.food offers daily fresh Turkish mezze, içli köfte and sarmalar in Strasbourg. Online ordering and delivery. Quality ingredients, master craftsmanship.
site.keywords: bonvera.food, Strasbourg Turkish food, mezze Strasbourg, içli köfte Strasbourg, sarmalar Strasbourg, Turkish cuisine Strasbourg, fresh mezze, traditional Turkish flavors, online order Strasbourg

cacik.name: Cacık
cacik.description: A refreshing mezze prepared with yogurt and grated cucumber, flavored with garlic and mint. Perfect starter for summer months.

ezme.name: Ezme
ezme.description: A perfect mezze for spice lovers, prepared with tomatoes, peppers, onions and spices. Traditional flavor blended with olive oil.

acili_humus.name: Spicy Hummus
acili_humus.description: One of the beloved mezze of Middle Eastern cuisine, prepared with chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice and olive oil. A flavor that leaves a mark on the palate with its spicy version.

amerikan_salatasi.name: American Salad
amerikan_salatasi.description: A classic salad prepared with potatoes, carrots, peas and mayonnaise, loved by children too. A colorful and nutritious starter.

barbunya_salatasi.name: Borlotti Bean Salad
barbunya_salatasi.description: A protein-rich, satisfying mezze prepared with borlotti beans, onions, parsley and olive oil. Healthy and delicious.

domates_kurusu.description: An intense and aromatic mezze prepared with sun-dried tomatoes, olive oil and fresh herbs. An indispensable part of Mediterranean cuisine.

fava.name: Fava
fava.description: A protein-rich mezze identified with Aegean and Greek cuisine, prepared with dried broad beans. Flavored with olive oil, lemon and fresh herbs.

grek_salatasi.name: Greek Salad
grek_salatasi.description: One of the most beloved salads of Mediterranean cuisine, prepared with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, onions and white cheese. Fresh and healthy.

mantar_salatasi.name: Mushroom Salad
mantar_salatasi.description: A natural and aromatic mezze prepared with fresh mushrooms, onions, parsley and olive oil. Favorite of mushroom lovers.

mor_lahana.name: Purple Cabbage
mor_lahana.description: A colorful and vitamin-rich mezze prepared with purple cabbage, carrots, parsley and lemon juice. Healthy and refreshing.

muammara.name: Muammara
muammara.description: An aromatic mezze from Syrian cuisine, prepared with walnuts, red peppers, bread and olive oil. Rich and satisfying flavor.

muhteber.name: Muhteber
muhteber.description: A traditional mezze from Hatay cuisine, prepared with eggplant, tomatoes, onions and spices. Richly aromatic and satisfying.

pancar_salatasi.name: Beetroot Salad
pancar_salatasi.description: A colorful and nutritious mezze prepared with boiled beets, walnuts, parsley and olive oil. A flavor that stands out with its natural sweetness.

patlicanli_humus.name: Eggplant Hummus
patlicanli_humus.description: A special mezze prepared by adding grilled eggplant to classic hummus, standing out with its smoky aroma. Different and delicious.

saksuka.name: Şakşuka
saksuka.description: One of the beloved mezze of Turkish cuisine, prepared with eggplant, tomatoes, peppers, onions and eggs. Colorful and satisfying.

tarator.name: Tarator
tarator.description: A refreshing mezze from Balkan cuisine, prepared with walnuts, bread, garlic, olive oil and lemon. Intensely aromatic and nutritious.

kizarmis_icli_kofte.name: Fried İçli Köfte
kizarmis_icli_kofte.description: İçli köfte prepared with traditional recipe, served fried. A special flavor that stands out with its crispy outer structure and delicious filling.

cig_icli_kofte.name: Raw İçli Köfte
cig_icli_kofte.description: İçli köfte prepared with traditional recipe, served raw. A healthy and delicious option made with fresh and natural ingredients.

yaprak_sarma.name: Grape Leaf Sarma
yaprak_sarma.description: Traditional sarma prepared with grape leaves, rice, onions and spices. One of the most beloved flavors of Turkish cuisine.

kabak_sarma.name: Zucchini Sarma
kabak_sarma.description: Delicious sarma prepared with zucchini leaves, rice, onions and spices. Light and healthy, a special flavor preferred in summer months.

patlican_sarma.name: Eggplant Sarma
patlican_sarma.description: Special sarma prepared with eggplant leaves, rice, onions and spices. Favorite of eggplant lovers, aromatic and delicious.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Bonvera is a closed-circuit kitchen-technology startup established to provide you with mezze and home-cooked meals with a daily fresh production approach, offering a simple and fast ordering experience.
about.feature1_desc: The heart of our flavors beats in Strasbourg, one of Europe's multicultural gastronomy centers. Each of our products is prepared daily and fresh.
about.feature2_desc: Our mezze prepared with the secret recipes of Turkish cuisine passed down from generation to generation brings together traditional flavors with modern hygiene standards.
about.feature3_desc: We use fresh vegetables and natural ingredients in our production. Our products prepared only with natural methods without using any preservatives.
about.feature4_desc: We follow the principle of 'same day preparation, same day service' in production. Each of our products is prepared daily in our kitchen in Strasbourg.
